text:
French Cup
PSG - Rennes: the complaint against Neymar, classified without continuation?
The floor of Bobigny reportedly announced the dismissal of the complaint of the Rennes supporter to the star striker of Paris Saint-Germain Neymar
04 Nov 2019, 20:20 by Charlie Creteur



Beyond his goal and decisive pass in the defeat of his team in the final of the Coupe de France against Rennes (2-2, 6-5 TAB), the star striker PSG Neymar had also made talk about his gesture of humor towards a Rennes supporter when he climbed the steps of the tribune of honor. As a result, he had filed a complaint against the player. A complaint that would have finally been dismissed, according to the information of the team.




"A little kiss on the forehead"




Neymar face Rennes in the French Cup final + 13 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The parquet of Bobigny would have decided in this file after having received the auditions of the two parts. "This ranking without follow-up and this reminder to the law are synonymous with a small kiss on the forehead," said the lawyer's supporter Me Philippe Ohayon. "The prosecutors are constantly trying to sue the people for the example, but for the sake of example, we decide not to proceed, imagine if my client hit this player." He was banned from stadium and sentenced to prison with or without suspension in court ". The message is over!
